Goal
To provide students of computer science and possibly other subjects with a game-like self-study environment which they can use to familiarize themselves with the basic concepts of formal reasoning, formal logic, and term re-writing systems.
Members
David M. Cerna, is a member of the LOGTECHEDU project. He provided the conceptual design and Application architecture. \n Rafael Kiesl, is a PhD student of the computational logic program at the Technical University of Vienna, was the main software developer. \n Alexandra Dzhyganska, provided the look and feel of the application and various design elements. On load screen Natural Deduction
